Class STAreaContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.type5.STAreaContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheInterface

    public class STAreaContent
extends java.lang.Object
implements CacheInterface
    Defines methods to handle STMicroelectronics Type5 Areas

      • writeNdefMessage

        public void writeNdefMessage(int ccOffsetInBlocks,
                             NDEFMsg msg,
                             byte flag,
                             byte[] uid)
                      throws STException
        Write a NDEF message with specified offset in block and flags. Message is written at ccOffsetInBlocks + offset of the area containing this NDEF
        Parameters:
        ccOffsetInBlocks - offset in block where to write NDEF message
        msg - NDEF Message to write, must not be null
        flag - Requested flags
        uid - TAG uid
        Throws:
        STException
